subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Will Power won the IndyCar Grand Prix of Sonoma at Infineon Raceway, a track from which he was airlifted a year ago after breaking his back in a crash in practice.
snippet: Will Power won the IndyCar Grand Prix of Sonoma at Infineon Raceway, a track from which he was airlifted a year ago after breaking his back in a crash in practice.
